item.description:
Come to our September meeting where we will be joined by AHA president and GWH member, David Niose.  Dave will be talking about his new book, "Nonbeliever Nation: The Rise of Secular Americans", which gives an overview the history of secular Americans, the rise of the Religious Right, and the rise in Secularism we are seeing in America today.  After his talk he will have a question and answer time and he will be signing books as well.

As always, we will be setting up around 6:30, so feel free to come and socialize. The program is scheduled to start at 7.  We are asking that non members make a small $5 donation at the door.

Please watch this page for changes.
item.name: David Niose, author of "Nonbeliever Nation: The Rise of Secular Americans"
